name: Average CIL and CT scores of students in grade 8, by education system: 2018
description: Average CIL and CT scores of students in grade 8, by education system: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The scale of CIL and CT scores is 100–700. The ICILS 2018 average is the average of all participating education systems meeting international technical standards, with each education system weighted equally.
sources: International Association for the Evaluation of Educational Achievement (IEA), ICILS, 2018. https://nces.ed.gov/surveys/icils/icils2018/theme1.asp?tabontop.Science and Engineering Indicators
